name: abruption
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the separation of the placenta (= the temporary organ that feeds a developing baby before it is born) from the wall of the uterus (= the organ in which a baby develops): She was concerned about abruption or pre-eclampsia during pregnancy. Placental abruption is a severe medical condition and requires urgent attention.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lack of visible bleeding does not mean that no abruption has occurred as the blood can be trapped internally.About 1 in 100 women experience placental abruption.
